mapper.sql: id, freight_id, create_time, from_location, to_location, transport_type, price, cost_time, "status"

id,

mapper.update:
update freight_info
freight_id = #{freightId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
from_location = #{fromLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_location = #{toLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transport_type = #{transportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
"status" = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update freight_info set freight_id = #{freightId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, from_location = #{fromLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_location = #{toLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transport_type = #{transportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "status" = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sum(price)/count(*) as averPrice,min(price) as minPrice from freight_info where from_location=#{fromLocationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1;
